p: Food, beverages and essential oils matrices may represent the top three applications when considering flavour and odour analysis. Beyond these obvious fields, odour analysis is also applied in other diverse areas such as environmental, biochemical and forensic sciences, as well as in analysis of wood, incense, tobacco and plastic materials.
